solution_line_template: On Tuesday Buddy has {monday_cards}/{tuesday_divisor} = <<{monday_cards}/{tuesday_divisor}={tuesday_cards}>>{tuesday_cards} baseball cards.
On Wednesday Buddy has {tuesday_cards}+{wednesday_purchase} = <<{tuesday_cards}+{wednesday_purchase}={wednesday_cards}>>{wednesday_cards} baseball cards.
On Thursday Buddy buys {tuesday_cards}/{thursday_divisor} = <<{tuesday_cards}/{thursday_divisor}={thursday_purchase}>>{thursday_purchase} baseball cards.
On Thursday Buddy has a total of {wednesday_cards}+{thursday_purchase} = <<{wednesday_cards}+{thursday_purchase}={thursday_cards}>>{thursday_cards} baseball cards.
